DOC.brief_summary: In Emergency Departments patients admitted with chest pain may suffer from non-significant to lifethreatening conditions. The aim of the present study is to develop and validate a referral model in chest pain patients which divide the patients with non- significant ECG changes into high risk and low risk groups for acute coronary syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of a High-risk Versus Low-risk Referral Model in Suspected Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: more than 15 years old Patients with STelevations in ECG
